page.title: 06SOCIAL LIFE IN OLDCOTES
page.content: {The W.I.(Womens Institute)}does alot of{charity work.}2 years ago they collected enough money for a{village in{Africa}to have{running water}so it saved them carrying water for miles. They have a{post office}which they had to{fight}to keep open as they did not think it was fair for{pensioners}to have to go into{Langold}to get their {pensions.}There was a{village school which has now been converted into a bungalow which is called{School House. On Sunday there are 3 churches to go to.The church of England was going to be closed down but the villagers opened it up again and now it is very popular.The{W.I.}meet in the village hall.Also there is a{Youth Club, {Badminton Club and Dancing.}If you have a{wedding}you can have your{ {reception }in it too.
